name: @nmshd/iql
description: Identity Query Language - A DSL to filter and query Enmeshed attributes
author: js-soft GmbH

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:parser && npm run build:version.ts && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.build:version.ts: mkdir -p generated && node -p "'export const LIB_VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';'" > generated/version.ts
scripts.demo: npm run build && npx light-server -s ./demo -w 'src/grammar.peggy, demo/app.js, demo/attributes.js, demo/index.html # cd demo && npm run build && npx webpack --mode production'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:tsc
